org.jisonami.crypto

类 Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jisonami.crypto.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object

    Created by jisonami on 2016/10/19.

    配置类，对于密钥生成以及加密解密相关参数的配置

    从以下版本开始:
    0.0.1
    作者:
    jisonami
    另请参阅:
    AbstractCryptography, SymmetricCryptography, NonSymmetricCryptography, KeyAgreementCryptography
